title: LoL Won't Open
body:
I'm trying to open my LoL, but it keeps saying "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" every time.
I re-installed it, nothing changed. Got rid of the lol_launcher files, nothing changed. Is the game going through maintenance?
Last played it was December 2016.

replies.body: It's working now. Thanks for the help. :)

Kernel errors are usually caused by OS settings that blocking the patcher from scanning files or launching at all.  You could have had software or Windows updates that re-configured those settings, so run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  Do not modify or delete files unless specified at the risk of causing more issues in the future.  Let me know if you have any questions, and welcome back!
